title: Which desktop 3D printer is most popular among professionals? - Quora

response.answer_text: As others have said, you can’t really answer this question without knowing more about the use to which the machine will be put. “3D Printing” is an all encompassing term and your precise needs will heavily influence the recommendation. However, it’s quite likely we’re talking here about an FDM machine (Fusion Deposition Modelling) and since no extraordinary requirements are listed, I’d suggest it doesn’t need to be very large. As such, the best source of information on this is probably: 2017 Best 3D Printer Guide from 3DHubs since their listings are based upon actual use by people selling their services (as opposed to being the opinions of reviewers or personal favourites). According the latest stats, the most popular are as follows: Budget: Original Prusa i3 MK2 (now selling the MK2S) ~$699 Workhorse: Makergear M2 ~$1825 Prosumer: Ultimaker 2+ ~$2499 (although now you’d probably buy the 3)
